title: New: Active Child – Diamond Heart
body:
This new cut from LA’s **Active Child** is set to feature on the deluxe edition of _**You Are All I See**_, out at the start of next month.

_Diamond Heart_ is an atmospherically brash pop track, featuring heavy percussion sections and powerful lead vocals, just itching to be played in a live setting. Pat Grossi’s project received much critical acclaim following the release of his debut LP _**You Are All I See**_ earlier in the year, and now the album will see a full UK release on November 1 via [**Vagrant**](http://vagrant.com/).

Check out Diamond Heart below.

 [Active Child – Diamond Heart](http://soundcloud.com/vagrantrecords/active-child-diamond-heart) by [Vagrant Records](http://soundcloud.com/vagrantrecords)

Image taken from [ActiveChildMusic.com](http://activechildmusic.com/photos/)
